actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Bryce Canyon National Park and the Cedar Breaks National Monument, Utah, as wilderness.

summary.text: Designates various lands in the Bryce Canyon National Park and the Cedar Breaks National Monument, Utah, as wilderness in accordance with the provisions of the Wilderness Act.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands in the Bryce Canyon National Park and the Cedar Breaks National Monument, Utah, as wilderness.
